author: Sabrina Ghayour
method: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil and cook the freekeh according to the packet instructions (about 15–20 minutes). Drain, rinse thoroughly until cold and place in a large mixing bowl. Add the remaining ingredients to the bowl with the freekeh and give everything a thoroughly good mix. Cover with cling film and allow to rest for an hour before serving.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz freekeh ,  1 small red onion, very finely chopped ,  250g/9oz dried cranberries ,  200g/9oz blanched almonds ,  20g/¾oz dill, fronds and stems finely chopped ,  400g/14oz pomegranate seeds,  150ml/¼ pint pomegranate molasses ,  generous glug of olive oil
